parameters: And now I have a dragon boy running around as well.
No doubt those filthy beasts are helping them to fight back.
Perhaps it is wise to hasten our plan?
This is exactly what I have planned for.
Everyone is playing their role perfectly in this play
And soon we shall raise the curtains for the next act.
Nobody will stand in my way.
Hehehe. Everything is going exactly as I want.
Oh, this will be so much fun~
This is merly the dress rehersal. Our actors have their roles, and the opening act is set in motion. Please, remain seated. There is much, much more to come~
